name: Deflect Attacks
trigger: when an attack roll hits you and its damage includes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing
effects: reduce the attack's total damage by 1d10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Monk level
if you reduce the damage to 0, you can expend 1 Focus Point to redirect the attack's force to a creature you can see within range
the chosen creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take damage equal to two rolls of your Martial Arts die + your Dexterity modifier (same damage type)
limits: melee redirect range is 5 feet; ranged redirect range is 60 feet and the target must not be behind total cover
